title: Workshop on Machine Learning Applications for Predicting Biodegradable Zinc Alloy Properties

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic materials engineering and statistical analysis, and foundational programming skills
context.additional_context: Small-group collaborative learning environment aimed at strengthening predictive modeling competencies applicable to real-world tasks

learning_goals: Learners can build machine learning models to predict mechanical properties (UTS) and corrosion characteristics (CR) of biodegradable zinc alloys.
Learners can explore optimal compositions of Zn-Mn series alloys using real-time visualization interfaces.
Learners can quantitatively analyze the impact of characteristic variables (composition, heat treatment conditions, etc.) on UTS and CR.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
